content.content: Based on feedback, EIP-1167 was updated in the following ways:  Specification includes code-golf runtime gas improvements Specification includes vanity-address based proxy deployment gas improvements Removed Factory and Probe code from the EIP as they are not part of the standard - they are tooling that implements / utilizes the standard.  The plan is to keep the EIP in “last call” status, but extend the comment period for an additional two weeks to allow for reaction to these changes. Comments go to: https://github.com/optionality/clone-factory/issues/10
content.GPT-summary: The author of EIP-1167 has updated the proposal based on feedback received. The changes include improvements to the specification and removal of non-standard code. The proposal is in "last call" status, but the comment period has been extended by two weeks to allow for feedback on the changes. The author is asking for comments on the proposal.
GPT-discussion-categories: Author of proposal is explaining proposal
Author of proposal is asking for feedback
